law.catch_line: Retail Installment Sale Agreements; Form And Contents

text.section: Do not sign this agreement if any of the spaces intended for the agreed terms to the extent of then available information are left blank.
You are entitled to a copy of this agreement at the time you sign it.
You may at any time pay off the full unpaid balance due under this agreement, and in so doing you may receive a partial rebate of the finance and insurance charges.
You may under certain circumstances redeem the property if repossessed because of your default, and you may, under certain conditions, require a resale of the property if repossessed.
The seller has no right to unlawfully enter your premises or commit any breach of the peace to repossess goods purchased under this agreement.
